Text: This is in Italian or somehting not English anyway

Actually, the last track on the CD (winx magiche canzoni (13).mp3) IS in English ? it's the original Italian theme song sung in English. :)

I quite enjoyed this upload, hup333 ? thank you. :)

Track list for 'Winx Club: Magiche Canzoni!' (Winx Club: Magical Songs!) (since the MP3s are not really tagged, and the filenames don't say what they are, either):

 1.) Nel Segno di Winx
 2.) Oggi No
 3.) Magic Winx
 4.) Magica Bloom
 5.) Sensazione
 6.) Onda Magica
 7.) Mi Manchi
 8.) Winx Combact
 9.) ScioglierĂ˛
10.) Le Ragazze del Winx Club
11.) Nel Segno di Winx Club (Strumentale)
12.) Le Ragazze del Winx Club (Strumentale)
13.) Magic Winx (Strumentale)
14.) Under the Sign of Winx

Track 14 is apparently the (European) English season 2 theme. Below are as many of the tracks as I could translate. I don't know what 'combact' means, though:

 1.) Nel Segno di Winx (Under the Sign of Winx)
 2.) Oggi No (Not Today)
 3.) Magic Winx
 4.) Magica Bloom (Magical Bloom)
 5.) Sensazione (Sensations? Feeling? Dunno. I use the former for this track, though)
 6.) Onda Magica (Magical Wave)
 7.) Mi Manchi (I'll Miss You)
 8.) Winx Combact
 9.) ScioglierĂ˛ (I Will Melt)
10.) Le Ragazze del Winx Club (The Girls of the Winx Club)
11.) Nel Segno di Winx Club (Strumentale) (Under the Sign of Winx (Instrumental))
12.) Le Ragazze del Winx Club (Strumentale) (The Girls of the Winx Club (Instrumental))
13.) Magic Winx (Strumentale) (Magic Winx (Instrumental))
14.) Under the Sign of Winx

Note: the ones that have '(Strumentale)' or '(Instrumental)' aren't FULLY instrumental; they still have the chorus and all, but most of the singing is gone. :)

And the MP3 list (so that you'll know what to name the tracks):
